column1: '''Old Toby''' was one of the three most notable varieties of [[pipe-weed]]
column2: grown in the region around [[Longbottom]] in [[the Shire]]'s [[Southfarthing]].<ref name="Pipeweed">{{FR|Pipeweed}}</ref>

column1: The leaf took its name from the Hobbit who introduced pipe-weed to the Shire
column4: who grew the first true pipe-weed in his gardens in the days of [[Isengrim Took II]] about the year {{SR|1070|n}} of [[Shire-reckoning]].

column1: How Old Toby came by the plant is not recorded
column2: for to his dying day he would not tell.<ref name="Pipeweed"/>

column1: :The smoke from Old Toby Pipe-weed takes the form of a large heart with a ring inside it.
:As [[Radagast]] narrates terrified to [[Gandalf]] his encounter with the [[Necromancer]] in [[Dol Guldur]]
column2: Gandalf offers him to pull from his pipe some "Old Toby" to calm down.
